column2: He looked at his watch: 10.33. He remembered being told, he couldn't recall when or by whom, that it was her practice to take her nightly swim shortly after nine o'clock.

10:33 p.m. Yesss, yesss. RECORDING CURRENT PROGRAM. Have done it! Aargh. All going mad. Cassette has started rewinding and now stopped and ejected. Why? Shit. Shit. Realize in excitement have sat on remote control.
